ai-tha-ap458:1.1_0: “There is no need for the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap458:1.3_0: they’re bound to a jungle thicket
ai-tha-ap458:2.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap458:2.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap458:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap458:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap458:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṇḍola Bhāradvāja.
